column92: Adjust how the GUI displays when the system is docked.
column96: When ON, your progress will autosave every time you sleep. When OFF, you will need to manually save your progress either at a bed or via the pause menu.
column98: You cannot save your progress at this time or from this location! Try again later.
column100: Save your progress? When you load your game, you will be returned to your den but your progress will be saved.
column114: [happy]That's beautiful. What are you going to do with it?
column120: Donate all of the required items to recruit this cat to your #colony_title#!
column121: You are not currently carrying any of this item! You cannot donate an item unless you have it in your inventory.
column122: You have already donated that item!
column128: But they'll need a place to live... Let's go build them a new home!
column129: Place the following buildings to continue: [red]#building_list#[/red]
column130: You've unlocked [purple]Gardening[/purple]! You can now use the [red]Garden[/red] to grow fresh herbs and flowers.///Please place the [red]Garden[/red] anywhere to continue.
column131: You can use the [red]Seed Maker[/red] to turn fresh herbs into seeds that can be sowed in the Garden.///Please place the [red]Seed Maker[/red] anywhere to continue.
column132: [neutral]Our community grows stronger with each new resident. You have done well, #player_name#.
column133: [happy]It is good to celebrate a healthy, growing #colony_title#. Excellent work, #player_name#.
column134: [thinking]We have never been stronger than we are today thanks to your efforts, #player_name#. Let's keep working hard for the betterment of our community.
column135: [playful]Every new resident is like a single stone laid in a mighty wall. Together we give meaning and purpose to one other.
column136: [happy]Your labors are rewarded today, #player_name#. We welcome all newcomers with open hearts and open arms.
column137: [playful]Oh yes, a [green]#curio_name#[/green]! I can say with the utmost confidence that I know exactly what this is...
column138: [neutral]So there you have it. I will add your donation to the gallery right away. The [purple]Museum[/purple] thanks you for your patronage.///[thinking]Do you have any additional [green]Curios[/green] to donate today?
column139: [neutral]So there you have it. I will add your donation to the gallery right away. The [purple]Museum[/purple] thanks you for your patronage.///[thinking]If you find any more [green]Curios[/green], please consider donating them to the [purple]Museum[/purple]!
column140: [shocked]Oh! That's your [purple]third Curio donation[/purple]!///[thinking]I have a [rainbow]special reward[/rainbow] I've been saving for you...///[playful]It's a [green]Tapestry[/green]! This wall decoration has been handed down for centuries. I trust you will take good care of it, #player_name#.///[neutral]You have done a great service to the [purple]Museum[/purple]. Truly it is the least I can do to recognize your generosity.
column141: [shocked]Oh! That's your [purple]tenth Curio donation[/purple]!///[thinking]I have a [rainbow]special reward[/rainbow] I've been saving for you...///[playful]It's an [green]Ancient Tablet[/green]! This glorious artifact bears a curious inscription. I trust you will take good care of it, #player_name#.///[neutral]You have done a great service to the [purple]Museum[/purple]. Truly it is the least I can do to recognize your generosity.
column142: [shocked]Oh! That's your [purple]twentieth Curio donation[/purple]!///[thinking]I have a [rainbow]special reward[/rainbow] I've been saving for you...///[playful]It's a [green]Curio Compactor[/green]! This crafting station can be used to upcycle your unwanted Curios into useful items. I trust you will take good care of it, #player_name#.///[neutral]You have done a great service to the [purple]Museum[/purple]. Truly it is the least I can do to recognize your generosity.
column143: [shocked]Oh ho ho! Finally! The [purple]Museum Gallery is complete![/purple] Well done, #player_name#. Well done indeed.///[happy]All 30 [green]Curios[/green] are now happily on display.///[playful]For the final time, I thank you for your patronage. You are always welcome to peruse the [purple]gallery[/purple] and view the fruits of your labors.///[thinking]At long last, my life's mission to gather every known human artifact is finished. Now I must find a new task.///[playful]But first, you are no doubt wanting your [rainbow]reward[/rainbow], yes? You have earned one, #player_name#!///[happy]I have been saving this [rainbow]Rainbow Power Paw[/rainbow] for this momentous occasion. It is yours now, #player_name#. Congratulations.
column144: [thinking]This bendy metal was used by humans to hold their head-fur up.///[shocked]Some human hair styles were quite complex and would require humans to wear hundreds of these at a time!
column145: [neutral]The length of this curious object is almost exactly the length that we believe that humans' mouths were.///[thinking]Perhaps humans would hold these in their mouths to keep their saliva from escaping the sides? Surely we are close to the truth.
column146: [thinking]What a curious little piece of fuzz. It is not edible and seems too small to serve any real function for the humans.///[shocked]This object requires further study to uncover its true purpose!
column147: [happy]Ah, this is a toe massager! Unlike our useful paws, humans had long, ugly toes on their front and back paws.///[neutral]They would massage the tips of those toes with this cylindrical device.
column148: [happy]A shredding toy! This is what humans would give to their kittens- or rather, children, they would call them.///[thinking]These toys came in many fun colors and shapes for the children to shred with their nails.///[neutral]I have read reports that suggest that these shredding toys often contained prizes inside, but I have yet to learn what was once held within.
column149: [neutral]This elastic device would be used to hold a bundle of items together, such as art supplies.///[thinking]Note that humans, though dim-witted, possessed great strength and large muscles.///[neutral]It takes a great deal of effort to stretch this band. Much easier for a human than for a cat, I assure you.
column150: [angry]Careful! This is very dangerous.///[angry]Humans would use this for intimidation. The high-pitched sounds of the crinkles were enough to scare off anyone.///[shocked]I will be careful in handling this artifact. You have done well in bringing it to me. I will make sure it is never again used for evil!
column151: [thinking]Ah, a shed piece of the outer-fur.///[neutral]Humans only had limited fur on their bodies. They had to use outer-fur to cover up their bodies or they would get cold.///[playful]Do I need outer-fur? Of course not. I am not as weak as a human!
column152: [neutral]Humans would string several of these odd objects together in a line, then wear them around their necks.///[thinking]They would give these necklaces out to other humans as gifts, no doubt to make the receiver become indebted to the giver. A strange way to make friends, wouldn't you agree?
column153: [neutral]This is scratch paper. Humans would scratch their claws, or rather, nails on this. Tearing it to shreds.///[sad]They also carved strange symbols upon the surface... I will diligently attempt to translate this document. Thank you for bringing it to me.
column154: [neutral]Humans would keep these in their pockets at all times for a small treat. They would rub the sweet wax onto their tongue.///[sad]Sadly there is no known way for us cats to open the seal and taste one for ourselves. It was made for human hands, not cat paws.
column155: [shocked]Ah, the famous mirror. Humans would look into these for hours, studying their own reflections.///[angry]Such unbridled vanity! It is a lesson to us all.
column156: [thinking]A bug squasher! Humans would toss this on the ground, letting it bounce up to the walls or ceiling to squish any bugs on the wall.///[neutral]A rather ingenious invention, especially for the usually dim-witted humans.
column157: [neutral]This is a simple construction material. Humans would build their homes out of these.///[playful]Silly humans! Trees are perfectly good shelters without the need to cut them down and turn them into wimpy little sticks like this.
column158: [blushing]This is beautiful art. Sometimes humans made things simply to look at. Quite an elegant sculpture, is it not?
column159: [shocked]Watch out for the point! The soft pink part is what was used here. The purpose of the sharpened end is currently unknown.///[neutral]Humans would use the pink part to clean their teeth after meals. It was said among the humans that it could 'erase' all the leftover tidbits of food. What an odd belief.
column160: [playful]This is clearly a fake claw. Humans sadly did not have their own claws.///[neutral]Because of this misfortune, they had to create fake ones like this! How sad it must have been to be a human.
column161: [neutral]Placed upon the top of a gift box, this artifact was thought to protect the contents of the box from those who would seek to steal the gift before it was given and unwrapped.///[happy]To be sure, this silly device could do no such thing. Why, then, did they insist on placing them on each and every gift? Humans and their strange customs...
column162: [angry]This is clearly a mitten. Don't let the softness fool you! This was used as punishment.///[shocked]Humans could not use their paws when they were forced to wear these for their crimes.
column163: [playful]Tempting, is it not? Look how shiny it is! Surely you also feel the irresistible urge to bat it around.///[thinking]It is said that when humans once captured cats like you and me and made them to live in their houses, they would set these toys out to tempt the cats to play.///[sad]However, the moment they were moved from their positions, the humans would become angry! Evidently they were a part of some ritual test.
column164: [neutral]All-purpose tools, most humans kept a handful of these metal tidbits in their pockets at all times.///[thinking]However, what is lost to time is the knowledge of what problems these objects helped solve. Perhaps with careful study we will be able to discover their purpose.
column165: [thinking]Legends tell of a delicious white potion that the humans would keep in gallon-sized jugs. On special occasions they might share a bit of this tasty liquid with their favorite cats.///[neutral]Attached to the jugs were these plastic prizes, just beneath the cap.///[angry]The humans were usually too dim-witted to realize that these objects even existed, and they often tossed out the empty jugs with these priceless artifacts still attached. How barbaric!
column166: [thinking]A silly device that humans would use to transfer liquids from a serving dish to their mouths.///[neutral]Why they did this remains a mystery, as they had perfectly functional tongues that they could use to lap up their drinks with ease if they had wished to do so.
column167: [thinking]Legends tell of a forbidden scratcher, an object so perfect for sharpening your claws that humans would lock them up in small rooms to keep cats like you and me out.///[angry]A true forbidden scratcher would include its soft white casing. This is merely the remains of one, used up and now non-functional.
column168: [thinking]These odd objects look and taste like wood, but they often smell sweet like fruit.///[shocked]What mystical powers allowed the humans to imbue these artifacts with such powerful scents?
column169: [neutral]A ceremonial device that humans would wear on the outside of their clothing as a show of status.///[thinking]The more heavy baubles attached to the ring and the louder they jingled, the more powerful that human was perceived to be.
column170: [happy]This is obviously a feather, similar in nature to a bird's.///[shocked]However, it is currently unknown why feathers such as these are so commonly discovered near abandoned human dwellings.///[thinking]Did humans secretly grow feathers and hide them from us cats? One day I will know all of their secrets!
column171: [neutral]A versatile piece of equipment. The hole in the center and the stretchy material allowed a human to wield it around an arm, a leg, or even around the neck as a tight sort of necklace.///[thinking]How did they ever resist the urge to play with it and bat it around?
column172: [thinking]A curious object, undoubtedly meant to be used as a fashionable accessory. However, these special ribbons were never worn, simply placed on walls or on shelves.///[shocked]Why would the humans create such a richly-colored bow if not to wear it? It boggles the mind.
column173: [shocked]What an odd creature! It has a tail and a body, yet no eyes. Humans used to keep these as pets upon their high tables.///[thinking]Humans were known to coddle these critters for hours on end.///[shocked]It leaves one to wonder, why give all that affection when these ungrateful creatures never seem to show any in return?
column182: Friendship points are easier to gain with all colony cats.
column183: Fighters from your colony gain extra hit points.
column184: All cats of your colony receive bonus points when XP is gained.
column185: A measure of your colony's caught food reserves.
column186: A measure of your colony's harvested goods, including herbs, flowers, and berries.
column187: A measure of your colony's accumulated wealth and luxury items.
column188: A measure of your colony's wood stockpile. Used for construction projects.
column189: A measure of your colony's stone stockpile. Used for construction projects.
column190: A measure of your colony's sand stockpile. Used for construction projects.
column192: Donate this [green]#item_name#[/green] to increase your stockpile by [black]#item_sell_price#[/black]?
column194: Donate all your items? (Some items cannot be donated and will remain in your inventory.)
column195: There is nothing you can donate at the moment!
column200: This project has already been constructed.
column202:
Construction Projects

View available construction projects and spend your stockpile resources to purchase them.
column209: You may place your new [purple]tunnel entrance[/purple] anywhere in town from the Build Menu. Visit the [red]Founder's Stone[/red] to access the Build Menu.
column210: You cannot afford that construction project! You must first increase your [purple]stockpile[/purple] values.
column211: Stockpiles are an abstract representation of your #colony_title#'s available resources.///Your #colony_title# can make use of a well-stocked stockpile, providing all members with several powerful perks or allowing you to construct special upgrades.///As soon as a stockpile is filled to or exceeding its daily [red]Burn Rate[/red], the resources will be used and its associated perk will activate for the remainder of the day.///If a stockpile has a higher value than its daily burn rate, the remainder will stick around for later use.///At the start of each day a stockpile will automatically be decreased by its [red]Burn Rate[/red] and its perk activated, if possible.///Some stockpiles do not have an associated perk and will not be consumed by a daily burn rate. These are instead used for construction projects.///There are two ways to increase a stockpile's value: [purple]donations[/purple] and [purple]squad assignments[/purple].///First, you can [purple]donate[/purple] certain items from your personal inventory. A [green]Mouse[/green] can be donated to increase your Prey Stockpile value, for example.///Second, you can send a [purple]squad[/purple] to a region that your #colony_title# currently controls. At the end of the day the squad will return with the resources associated with the region they have been guarding.
column212: Speak with #npc_name_talon# to assign [purple]squads[/purple].///As your #colony_title# continues to expand you'll find it easier to collect resources for your stockpiles. Good luck!
column213: You will unlock [purple]squad assignments[/purple] later as you continue to recruit new cats. Good luck!
column214: [green]Curios[/green] are strange objects that fascinate most cats.///You can find [green]Unidentified Curios[/green] in various places throughout the world: in the mines, in certain shops, even littered on the ground.///Bring your [green]Unidentified Curios[/green] here to have them identified. An identified [green]Curio[/green] may be kept or donated to the Museum.///#npc_name_glimmer#, the Museum curator, will be happy to take a [green]Curio[/green] donation, so long as it has not already been donated.///There will surely be rewards for those who donate lots of [green]Curios[/green].///Can you discover and donate one of every kind of [green]Curio[/green]?
column216:

column218:

Expand your barracks, allowing you to assign 1 additional Squad every day.
column220:

column222:
Refined Litter

After constructing this project, every time you complete a task you will receive +1 Task Token as a bonus reward.
column224:
Sturdy Chisels

After constructing this project, diamonds will be more common when mining on levels where diamonds can be found.
column226:
Cultivation

After constructing this project, most herbs that grow in your colony's territories will be rank .
column228:
Improved Roofing

After constructing this project, sleeping in your bed will yield bonus XP and heal additional hearts.
column230:
Hunting Compendium

After constructing this project, legendary prey will spawn more commonly in your colony's territories.
column232:

After constructing this project, you may place a tunnel entrance in your town that will instantly warp you northwest to the Thicket Burrows region.
column234:

column236:
Tunnel: Southwest

column238:
Tunnel: Southeast

After constructing this project, you may place a tunnel entrance in your town that will instantly warp you southeast to the Western Wastes region.

column549: [neutral]Alright, where should I send the [purple]squads[/purple]? They can attack enemy territory or defend our own to gather resources.
column551: [thinking]I can send out a [purple]squad[/purple] to attack that region. They won't be able to bring back resources until we take it over.
column552: [neutral]Since that's our territory, I can send a [purple]squad[/purple] to defend the region and collect its resources for the stockpile.
column553: [angry]All the [purple]squads[/purple] have already been assigned, can't you do the math? They won't be back for reassignment until tomorrow.
column554: [thinking]If you spent some of our stockpile resources to expand our [red]barracks[/red], we could increase the number of daily [purple]squads[/purple] we have available.
column555: [angry]What are you thinking? I can't send a [purple]squad[/purple] there!
column556: [angry]Are you losing it?? You've already assigned a [purple]squad[/purple] to that region.
column557: [angry]There's a voidling attack happening there and I already dispatched some cats to deal with it. I shouldn't send another [purple]squad[/purple] to that region until the scouts report back about the battle.
column558: Would you like to [orange]skip the intro[/orange] or [orange]play the intro[/orange] this time?
column561: I shouldn't go that way until I've delivered the [green]Valerian[/green] to #npc_name_spark#. I heard it grows in the meadow to the south?
column562: I shouldn't return to the campsite empty-handed. #npc_name_coco# said there's [green]Mice[/green] to hunt in the clearing to the south. I should head that way!
column563: I shouldn't return without #npc_name_coco#. I wonder if there's still something I need to do here? I should talk to them first.
column564: I shouldn't go that way right now. I wonder if there's something I still need to do here?
column565: [gray](Open your [orange]Inventory[/orange] and select the [green]Valerian[/green] to hold it. Then, give it to #npc_name_spark#.)[/gray]
column566: [gray](Press [red]#tutorial_control_string_dodge#[/red] to perform a [purple]dodge[/purple]. Avoid the wind gusts and press onward!)[/gray]
column567: [gray](Press [red]#tutorial_control_string_sneak#[/red] to sneak. Approach the [green]Mouse[/green], then press [red]#tutorial_control_string_attack#[/red] to pounce!)[/gray]
column568: [gray](You can view your [orange]hunger bar[/orange] in the lower-left hand corner of the screen. It looks like a fish.)[/gray]///[gray](As you play, your [orange]hunger bar[/orange] will decrease over time. You'll need to eat regularly so you won't take damage from starvation.)[/gray]
column569: [gray](First, pick up the [green]Mouse[/green] with [red]#tutorial_control_string_primary#[/red].)[/gray]///[gray](Then, open your [orange]Inventory[/orange] with [red]#tutorial_control_string_inventory#[/red] and find the [green]Mouse[/green]. Press [red]#tutorial_control_string_tertiary#[/red] to eat it.)[/gray]
column570: This is your inventory. Here you can view all of the items that you are currently carrying.///Select the [green]Valerian[/green] and press [red]#tutorial_control_string_primary#[/red] to [orange]HOLD[/orange] it in your mouth, then close your inventory and give it to #npc_name_spark#.
column571: Select the [green]Mouse[/green] and press [red]#tutorial_control_string_tertiary#[/red] to [orange]EAT[/orange] it.
column572: [gray](Press [red]#tutorial_control_string_attack#[/red] to [purple]attack[/purple]. Defeat the Voidling Cat with your claws!)[/gray]
column573: [gray](Hold [red]#tutorial_control_string_attack#[/red] to [purple]charge your attack[/purple]. Then, release it to launch yourself into battle and deal extra damage!)[/gray]
column574: [gray]([orange]Skills[/orange] are powerful abilities that will aid you as you play. You can learn and improve many different [orange]Skills[/orange] over time.)[/gray]///[gray](You can view your equipped [orange]Skills[/orange] in the lower-left hand corner of the screen. Find [red]Lion's Roar[/red] and activate it to continue!)[/gray]
column575: I've had a long day! I really should sleep in my bed before venturing out again.

column598: This is the [red]Build Menu[/red]. Use this menu to place or move buildings, paths, decor, and more.///Place the [orange]Temple[/orange] building anywhere to continue.
column599: Great work! You've placed the [orange]Temple[/orange]. Close the [red]Build Menu[/red] to continue.
column600: [gray](Press [red]#tutorial_control_string_pause#[/red] to commit your changes and close the Build Menu.)[/gray]
column608: No tasks are currently available. Check back tomorrow!
column622: Here is the [green]Task Board[/green], a place for community members to post their requests. What would you like to do?
column623: Every day a new [green]Task[/green] gets posted to the [green]Task Board[/green]. Accept a [green]Task[/green] to help your neighbors out and get rewarded!///Once you've completed a [green]Task[/green], speak with the associated neighbor. You'll earn [green]Task Tokens[/green], a currency that can be spent at the Task Board Shop.///You'll also get a boost to your friendship with the particular neighbor that you've helped out. It's a win-win!///You can view your active [green]Tasks[/green] in the [green]Task Log[/green] at any time. You may have up to 4 active [green]Tasks[/green] at any given time.///[green]Tasks[/green] have no deadlines and may be completed at your leisure.///If you decide you don't wish to complete a [green]Task[/green] you may cancel it at any time from the [green]Task Log[/green].///That's everything there is to know about [green]Tasks[/green]!
column626: You've accepted a new [green]Task[/green]! Track your progress in the Task Log. Good luck!
column627: You cannot accept that [green]Task[/green] because your Task Log is full. Try completing or canceling a [green]Task[/green] before accepting a new one.
column639: Turn in #item_name# #quantity# to complete this task?
column644: Your inventory is full, please come back with some empty room for this item.
column645: You do not have enough [green]Task Tokens[/green] to purchase this item. Try completing a few [green]Tasks[/green] first.
column647: It pays to be helpful, literally!
column649: Turn your experience helping others into experience you can spend.
column651: These coins are always popular with moles.
column653: You've entered the mysterious region known as the Wildwood. What mysteries await in this strange new world?
column677: [happy]Welcome, one and all, to the wedding ceremony of #player_name# and #player_spouse_name#! We are delighted that you are able to join us on this auspicious day.///[thinking]A wedding is a time to celebrate. A time to reflect on the good things in life. A time to share in one of life's greatest joys.///[neutral]We have gathered together because we wish nothing but the best for both #player_spouse_name# and #player_name#. Their commitment and love for one another inspires us all.///[happy]Now, without further ado, let us continue with the vows!///[thinking]Do you, #player_name#, promise to love, cherish, and admire #player_spouse_name# with all your heart?
column678: [happy]And do you, #player_spouse_name#, promise to love, cherish, and admire #player_name# with all your heart?
column679: [playful]Wonderful! Then it is my great pleasure to pronounce you both married.
column680: [happy]Let's all hear a cheer for the new couple... #player_name# and #player_spouse_name#!
column691: Set how difficult the challenges you encounter in-game will be.
column699:
Normal: Spiders and spider-like creatures will appear as usual.
Alternative: Spiders and spider-like creatures will appear as simple circles.
column701: Light flash visual effects, such as lightning during a thunderstorm. Those sensitive to bright flashes of light should turn this setting OFF.

Default: ON

menu to re-enable Achievements.
column705:
Quick Time: Succeed with perfect timing.
Coin Toss: A random chance of success.
Immersive: Same as Coin Toss, but no GUI and no prey radius will show.
Default: Quick Time

Change how long each day will last.

Leisurely: +100% day length
Relaxed: +50% day length
Normal: +0% day length
Quick: -25% day length
column715:
Whether or not random roving packs of enemies will spawn throughout the world.
Default: ON
column717: When ON, the game will attempt to smooth out any framerate drops. OFF is not recommended.

When ON, the game will automatically replace any non-existent translations with the English version (if possible.) When OFF, the game will instead display the missing language key.
Default: ON

column730: Set the game to Fullscreen display mode.
column732: Set the game to Windowed display mode.

column736: Adjust the size of all GUI elements.

Set to SMOOTH for best visuals, RIGID for increased accessibility.
Default: SMOOTH

column744: Turn to FANCY for best visuals, SIMPLE for a less intensive method, or OFF for best performance.
column746: Turn ON for best visuals, OFF for best performance.
column748: Turn ON for best visuals, OFF for best performance.
column750: Toggle vertical synchronization. OFF is recommended, but you may get better performance with V-Sync ON.

When Diagnostics is ON, you will see your FPS and other helpful information displayed on the screen.
Default: OFF
column754: When ON, helpful text hints will appear at various times at the top of your screen. When OFF, they will not be shown.

column1033: You've sown #plant_id# that are growing here. Are you sure you want to uproot this plant to clear this space in your garden?
column1391: Your inventory is full! Try dropping something first.
column1392: Tip: Try getting closer before pouncing to make it easier to catch your prey.
column1393: Tip: Don't get too close before pouncing or you'll scare your prey away.
column1396: [shocked][red]Error![/red] This dialog does not exist! Please report this error to help make [rainbow]Cattails[/rainbow] a better game. Dialog path: #dialog_path#
column1397: [shocked]Goodness me! #player_name#, you're awake! Excellent.///[sad]You were looking pretty bad when we found you. Lucky we got to you when we did.///[happy]But never fear, I have patched up your injuries. A little rest has done you some good, hmm? I'll just need to assess you once more before I set you loose...///[shocked]You may have dropped some things when you passed out. I'd be more careful from now on if I were you.///[neutral]Alright, you look fine to me. Stay safe out there, #player_name#. I'd hate to see you in that awful state again.
column1398: [white]Your vision flickers out as you fall to the ground...[/white]///[white]This cannot be the end, can it? You must keep fighting![/white]///[white]In the depths of your dark dreams, you hear the muffled sound of a familiar voice calling out...[/white]
column1399: [blushing]Hey #player_name#... are you asleep?///[thinking]I've been thinking... Maybe it would be nice to have some little paws running around the den?///[blushing]You know, kittens! We could have a bigger family. Don't you think that would be nice?///[shocked]But not if you don't want to. I just thought I would ask.///[blushing]So what do you think #player_name#? Should we try to have a litter of kittens of our own?
column1400: [happy]Greetings #player_name#, my beloved. I have come to you in your dreams to ask you an important question.///[thinking]Perhaps it would be satisfying for you to have some little paws running around the den. I have heard it is not uncommon for mortal cats to wish for such a thing.///[blushing]Most cats seem to structure their entire lives around the prospect of having a litter of their own. I assume you have given it some thought.///[thinking]Is this what you desire? To have kittens to raise?
column1415: You must give your kitten a name before you continue!
column1416: [blushing]We have such an amazing family. I feel so blessed to be a part of all of this. Our kids are pretty great, aren't they?
column1417: [neutral]#npc_name_kittenone# keeps asking where you went. I keep telling them that you're very busy with important #colony_title# business, which of course you are.///[happy]I think #npc_name_kittenone# is quite attached to you. Good thing you're such a good role model, #player_name#.
column1418: [shocked]Do you know where we put the art supplies? #npc_name_kittentwo# was asking about starting a new project and I couldn't remember where they went.///[thinking]Probably somewhere buried in storage... I'll look for them, don't worry about it.
column1419: [happy]It's so nice to watch our kittens personalities start to come out. #npc_name_kittenthree# seems really mature for their age.///[shocked]You should hear the conversations they have with me! Sometimes I even learn a thing or two from them. Funny how that works out.
column1420: [thinking]I've been trying to encourage #npc_name_kittenfour# to get out and make some new friends, but I know that's not the easiest for them.///[neutral]Do you think it's alright that they spend so much time alone? Is that healthy for a child?///[thinking]I don't know. I wonder how our parents figured all this stuff out.
column1421: [playful]I had assumed this was the case. Yes, you will have kittens someday soon. It is not beyond my strength to grant.///[blushing]I love you, #player_name#. I'm sure you will raise them well.
column1422: [shocked]Are you certain? You do not ever wish to have kittens?
column1423: [thinking]I understand, #player_name#. You have much to do before you begin to raise children.///[neutral]I will ask again later. Perhaps then you will know one way or the other.
column1424: [happy]Understood, #player_name#. If that is your desire, then you shall remain childless.///[thinking]Surely there are many important things for a #leader_title# to accomplish outside of parenting.///[happy]I will gladly honor your request.
column1425: [happy]Oh, you think so? Yes, I can't wait 'til we have our very own kittens!///[blushing]I love you, #player_name#. You're going to make such a good parent, you know that?
column1426: [shocked]Really? You think you'll never, ever want to have kittens? That's fine if so, just making sure...
column1427: [blushing]Oh, ok! I get it. You like how it is now with just you and me. But maybe someday you'll change your mind?///[happy]Alright, I'll ask again later. I'm happy with how things are right now too.
column1428: [happy]Alright, I understand! Kittens aren't for everyone. Besides, we're plenty happy now with the ways things are. Let's keep it just like this.///[blushing]I love you, #player_name#.
column1429: [neutral]#player_name#... The time has come. You must wake up now.///[happy]The [red]kittens[/red] are here! Aren't they precious?///[playful]There's [red]four[/red] of them. You will no doubt have your paws full for a while.///[happy]You should clean them up so you can get a better look at them and decide their names.
column1430: [happy]Welcome to the world, little ones. I can see that they have made you quite proud, #player_name#.///[happy]I see so much of you in their eyes, #player_name#. They're going to all grow up big and strong under your watchful eye.///[thinking]#npc_name_kittenone#, #npc_name_kittentwo#, #npc_name_kittenthree#, and #npc_name_kittenfour#... They all have fateful lives ahead of them.
column1431: [shocked]#player_name#! It's happening! It's finally happening!///[happy]The [red]kittens[/red] are here! Aren't they precious?///[blushing]Just look at their tiny little faces... They're so beautiful.///[blushing]Wow, there's [red]four[/red] of them! We'll have our paws full, won't we?///[happy]Let's clean them up so we can get a better look at them. What are we going to name them?
column1432: [blushing]Oh, they are so amazing... I'll hold two and you hold the other two. Aww, listen to their mewling. Welcome to the world, little ones.///[happy]I can see so much of you in their eyes, #player_name#. They're going to all grow up big and strong, aren't they?///[blushing]#npc_name_kittenone#, #npc_name_kittentwo#, #npc_name_kittenthree#, and #npc_name_kittenfour#... You four little ones have changed our lives and made us very, very happy.///[happy]You're all going to do amazing things when you grow up. I just know it.
column1433: [playful]Hello #player_name#. We're still getting things ready for the festival. Come back around 10am, OK? It's going to be worth the wait, I promise!
column1434: [shocked]Oh no, #player_name#! You're too late, we've already wrapped up the festivities for the day. So terribly sorry! Better luck next time.
column1435: [shocked]Ack!! You've arrived too soon! No no, #player_name#, we can't spoil the fun by letting you in a second too early! Preparations are still under way!///[playful]Why don't you return around 10am, hmm? That would be best, I think!
column1436: [sad]What a pity, the festival is already over... It was great fun, but now we must return to our lives. Oh well.///[thinking]Sorry #player_name#. Try arriving sooner next time if you want to join in.
column1437: Leave the festival and return to your den? You will not be able to return today.
column1441: Would you like to wrap things up and leave the wedding?
column1446: [scary][black]I am the steward of a great treasure. I watch over it until the one who can claim it will come at last. Do you wish to challenge me for it?[/black][/scary]
column1450: [scary][black]Then prepare yourself! The challenge is about to commence...[/black][/scary]
column1451: [black]I'll ask you questions, and you'll answer them![/black]///[black]Correctly answer 3 questions and I'll give you a reward.[/black]///[black]But if you miss 3 questions, you're [scary]out![/scary][/black]///[black]Here we go![/black]
column1453: [black]Oh, not quite! That is incorrect. The correct answer was [blue]'#correct_answer#'[/blue].[/black]
column1454: [black][bouncy]Astounding! Superb! [rainbow]#player_name#, you've won![/rainbow][/bouncy][/black]///[black]Great work. I'll distribute the prize now. I've been your host. Thanks for playing![/black]
column1455: [black]Oh, would you look at that... Three incorrect responses are on the board. Unfortunately you do know what that means. You're all out of chances![/black]///[black]Hey, why the long face? Why don't you come on back some other time and give it another go? Better luck next time, #player_name#.[/black]

column1722: Using this item will summon an invasion of Voidling Cats that will spawn in several waves. Defeat every wave and you will be rewarded. If you leave the area you will forfeit the challenge.///It's a difficult challenge! You should prepare well before you begin.///Would you like to use the [red]#item_name_wretched_talisman#[/red] now and begin the invasion?
column1725: Adventuring is more fun when you travel with a friend! You can take 1 [red]Buddy[/red] with you on your journeys at a time.///Each cat has unique strengths that can benefit you or your #colony_title# while they are at your side. These are called [purple]traits[/purple].///As you adventure together, your buddy will earn [blue]Buddy XP[/blue], a measure of their ongoing learning.///Once your buddy earns enough [blue]Buddy XP[/blue] they can [red]level up[/red] to increase their stats and abilities.///You'll need to return to this menu once your Buddy has filled their [blue]Buddy XP[/blue] bar and choose the [red]Level Up[/red] option, which costs a little of your own XP.///The maximum level a Buddy can achieve is [red]Level 10[/red].///Have fun adventuring together!
column1726: You don't have enough XP right now to level up this Buddy!
column1727: You cannot use that item right now because you do not have a Buddy following you! Try again when you have a Buddy adventuring with you.
column1728: You cannot use that item right now! Try again later.
column1729: Spend [red]#xp_cost# XP[/red] to Level Up this buddy?
column1731: Your buddy has unlocked a [blue]new level[/blue]! Their stats and abilities have increased.
column1734: You can only have one [red]Buddy[/red] following you at a time! Please dismiss your current [red]Buddy[/red] before trying to bring another along.
column1735: You cannot recruit a [red]Buddy[/red] from the Social panel! Go speak with this cat if you wish to adventure with them.
column1736: This feline is full of life and it's hard to dampen their mood! This cat has a bonus to their maximum hit points, making them harder to take down.
column1737: You wouldn't want to be on this cat's bad side. Their brutal attacks deal bonus damage, allowing them to defeat their enemies quicker.
column1738: An excellent constitution gives this cat immunity to all negative status effects, including poison.
column1739: What is it about this cat that makes them always seem so fortunate? You're not sure, but adventuring with them by your side is sure to have its benefits.
column1740: This cat is able to grasp new concepts quickly, allowing them to earn bonus Buddy XP. You might also learn a thing or two, granting you bonus XP!
column1741: The presence of this cat commands a higher level of performance on the battlefield. All nearby fighters from your colony will deal bonus damage.
column1742: This sneaky feline knows how to avoid attention. They have an easier time catching prey and can share their knowledge with you while you hunt by their side.
column1743: Some cats have a natural knack for making money. This cat will sometimes stumble across hidden Mews which they'd be happy to share with you.
column1744: This cat is known far and wide for their accomplishments. While adventuring with them your colony will slowly gain Influence in any region you spend time in.
column1745: Lending a helping paw comes naturally to this kitty. When your health gets low, they may sometimes heal a small amount of your damage with their restorative skills.
column1746: Nothing can get in their way! While mining, this cat may occasionally break all nearby rocks, revealing the precious contents hidden within.
column1747: A tender cat can find value where others may overlook it. When harvesting herbs, this cat has a chance to collect an herb 1 rank better than what appeared to be growing.
column1748: If you've ever seen this cat in a scrap, you won't soon forget it. When in combat, this cat may apply a damage-over-time effect to all nearby enemies.
column1749: An observant eye can discern hidden truths that others would never have seen. After a successful pounce, this wily cat has a chance to catch 2 prey instead of 1.
column1750: [playful]Want to play [red]Cat, Fish, River[/red]? It's easy. You'll pick one and I'll pick one.///[orange]Cat[/orange] beats [green]Fish[/green], [green]Fish[/green] beats [blue]River[/blue], and [blue]River[/blue] beats [orange]Cat[/orange]. Want to play?
column1751: [playful]Ok, I brought my dice with me! I'll roll [red]3 six-sided dice[/red] and tell you the total.///Then I'll roll again, but first I'll ask you if you think the second roll total will be less than or greater than the first. If you're right, you win! Does that sound good to you?
column1752: [playful]Want to go on a [red]paw hunt[/red]? I'll toss 3 paw-shaped tokens around the area.///If you can chase all 3 of them down I'll give you a prize. Sound fun to you?
column1753: [playful]Today we're playing [red]Mouse Chase[/red]. We're just about to begin a new round.///You can play up to 3 times today. I'll award some [red]festival tokens[/red] to every cat that joins in. What do you say?
column1754: [playful]Today we're hosting the [red]Turtle Race[/red]. A new round is just about to begin.///You can play up to 3 times today. I'll award some [red]festival tokens[/red] to every cat that cheers for a turtle. What do you say?
column1755: [playful]Today we're playing [red]Pumpkin Roll[/red]. We're just about to begin a new round.///You can play up to 3 times today. I'll award some [red]festival tokens[/red] to every cat that participates. What do you say?
column1756: [playful]Today we're having a [red]Snowball Fight[/red]. A new round is just about to begin.///You can play up to 3 times today. I'll award some [red]festival tokens[/red] to every cat that plays. What do you say?
column1757: [shocked]Oh, sorry #player_name#! I think I'm done playing games for now. Enjoy the rest of the festival.
column1758: [thinking]The games have already concluded for today. Thank you for participating, #player_name#! You'll get another shot at the next festival, ok?
column1759: [neutral]Who's ready to play some [red]Mouse Chase[/red]?///[thinking]The rules are simple. Earn 1 point for every [green]Mouse[/green] you catch. [green]Golden Mice[/green] are worth 5 points, so don't miss those.///[shocked]And watch out for the tricky [green]Rats[/green]! If you catch one of those, you'll lose 3 points.///[neutral]Your opponents today will be #festival_opponent_1# and #festival_opponent_2#.
column1760: [neutral]It's time for another round of the [red]Turtle Race[/red].///[thinking]When your turtle is looking down and out, offer some encouragement. A timely cheer can get even the most downtrodden turtle back on their feet.///Everybody, please pick a turtle to cheer on! They perform much better when their spirits are high.
column1762: [neutral]The [red]Pumpkin Roll[/red] is about to begin!///[thinking]Run towards the right and [red]dodge[/red] the oncoming pumpkins. They'll try to push you back. If you get shoved too far left, you're [red]out[/red]!///[neutral]Your opponents today will be #festival_opponent_1# and #festival_opponent_2#.
column1763: [neutral]It's almost time for another [red]Snowball Fight[/red]. I think the players are ready!///[thinking]Throw snowballs at your adversaries to score points. Watch out for incoming snowballs and don't get hit!///[neutral]Your opponents today will be #festival_opponent_1# and #festival_opponent_2#.
column1766: [happy]Ok, it sounds like the players are all ready. Here we go!
column1767: [neutral]And that's the end! The round is over!///[thinking]#player_name#, you earned [red]#tokens_earned# Festival Tokens[/red]. Great work out there.///[happy]Thanks for playing, everyone.
column1772: [neutral]Ok, that's fine. Let me know if you change your mind!
column1773: [happy]Wonderful, I'll let the others know you'll be joining. Follow me to the event!
column1774: [happy]Awesome! Remember, you're looking for [red]3 paw-shaped tokens[/red]. Good luck!
column1775: [happy]Ok, let's do this! My first roll was [red]#dice_total#[/red] [gray](#dice_1#+#dice_2#+#dice_3#)[/gray]. Will my next roll be higher or lower?
column1776: [neutral]Let's see what the dice say about that! I'll give them another roll...///[thinking]The new roll is [red]#dice_total#[/red] [gray](#dice_1#+#dice_2#+#dice_3#)[/gray].///[happy]#player_name#, you were right! Congrats. Here's [red]2 Festival Tokens[/red] as a reward.///[playful]Thanks for playing!
column1777: [neutral]Let's see what the dice say about that! I'll give them another roll...///[thinking]The new roll is [red]#dice_total#[/red] [gray](#dice_1#+#dice_2#+#dice_3#)[/gray].///[shocked]Oh no, #player_name#! Looks like you were incorrect. Better luck next time, huh?///[neutral]Thanks for playing.
column1778: [happy]Ok, it's on! Make a choice: [orange]Cat[/orange], [green]Fish[/green], or [blue]River[/blue]?
column1779: [neutral]I choose... #other_cfr_choice#///[thinking]Looks like I won that round. Better luck next time, #player_name#.
column1780: [neutral]I choose... #other_cfr_choice#///[shocked]We both chose the same option. That's a tie. Let's go again...
column1781: [neutral]I choose... #other_cfr_choice#///[happy]Well played, #player_name#! You beat me. Here's [red]2 Festival Tokens[/red] as a reward.///[playful]Thanks for playing!
column1782: You've found all 3 paw-shaped tokens! Your reward is [red]2 Festival Tokens[/red]. Congratulations!
column1783: [happy]Hey, you haven't tracked down those [red]3 paw-shaped tokens[/red] yet, have you? No reward for you 'til you find them all!
column1792: You found a [rainbow][bouncy]#power_paw#![/bouncy][/rainbow] You are filled with vigor by the ancient token.
column1794: Your [light blue]Maximum Hunger[/light blue] has increased!
column1799: [blushing]Are you sure about that? You look fine to me! I cannot operate on a healthy cat!
column1801: [thinking]Based on my assessment and the cost of materials and labor, I can heal you fully for [yellow]#heal_price_full# Mews[/yellow]. It would be my honor to patch you up!
column1802: [shocked]There's quite a lot to mend! I can either heal you fully for [yellow]#heal_price_full# Mews[/yellow], or just a small patch-up for [yellow]#heal_price_partial# Mews[/yellow].
column1806: [thinking]Oh, are you sure? That's your decision. Come back anytime and I can fix you up.
column1807: [blushing]Oh my! This is ermm... a rather awkward development, but you cannot afford my services at the moment. I am sorry #player_name#, but medical supplies are not cheap! I cannot operate for free. I trust you will understand!
column1808: [happy]There we are, that looks quite a lot better! Stay healthy, #player_name#.
column1809: [neutral]You want to manage the details of #colony_title_with_article#? What did you have in mind?
column1810: [happy]Very nice! I'll get those changes filed away and make sure to notify everybody. You'll now be known as #leader_title_with_article# of #colony_full_name_with_article#.
column1811: [thinking]Oh? Changed your mind?///That's just fine. Come back if you think of a great idea for #colony_full_name_with_article#!
column1812: [happy]You have something to donate to the [purple]Museum[/purple]? Let's see it!
column1813: [shocked]Ack! You have no [green]Curios[/green] that can be donated to the [purple]Museum[/purple] at the moment!///[happy]Come back when you have something of interest and I'll be happy to take a look.
column1814: [playful]Surely you jest, #player_name#! You have already donated every known [green]Curio[/green] to the [purple]Museum[/purple]! I once again thank you for your patronage.
column1815: [thinking]You want to check on #colony_title_with_article#'s [purple]stockpiles[/purple]? Alright, but don't think about walking away with anything. I've got my eye on you.
column1816: [happy]Oh, I'd love to help with that! Everybody needs a good new [blue]name[/blue] from time to time. What do you want everybody to call you?
column1817: [happy]Sure thing, I'd be happy to file the paperwork to change your kitten's name! What did you have in mind?
column1818: [thinking]#player_name#? Yeah, that has a nice ring to it! I'll let everybody know they should call you #player_name# from now on, OK?
column1819: [shocked]Oh, you're happy with your name as is?///OK, I'll keep calling you #player_name# for now.
column1820: [shocked]Oh, no changes? That's fine. Come back if you change your mind.
column1821: [happy]Great, I'll get those changes filed right away!
column1850: (c) 2023 Falcon Development, LLC. All rights reserved. No part of this game is intended as medical or nutritional advice for cats. Do not attempt to feed or provide a cat with medical treatment using any of the techniques or items presented in this game. Consult a veterinarian instead. Also, if at all possible, it's best that cats are left inside. Feral cats bring a host of problems to their local ecosystems and multiply rapidly.

column1888: Once upon a time, three great cat colonies lived in a plentiful land.
column1889: For generations they thrived, hunting the critters of the region and harvesting the fruits of the forest.
column1890: Sometimes, the colonies bickered and fought. But each of their leaders shared a respect for the spiritual mediator of their world: The Forest Guardian.
column1891: The word of the Guardian was law, and all cats revered them.
column1892: From the Sacred Temple, the Guardian kept the balance over the cat-lands, working for the benefit of all.
column1893: The cats of the forest thrived.
column1894: They played in the meadows and ruled over the hills. They built strong walls and gathered prey for winter.
column1895: But one fateful day, calamity struck! In an instant, the Temple was shattered. A terrible earthquake tore the stones from their ancient resting places.
column1896: A horrible rift was ripped open in the ground. Every cat shuddered with fear.
column1897: Worse than the destruction of the land was the fading of its Guardian...
column1898: With a weak voice, the Forest Guardian announced that the land was no longer safe for any cat.
column1899: A new home must be found, and a new Temple must be built, or else the Guardian's spirit would not survive.
column1900: Then, the spirit of the Guardian flickered and vanished. The frightened cats mourned, and did not know what to do.
column1901: A great meeting was called, and all the cats of the forest attended. Together, they deliberated long over what must be done.
column1902: The decision was reached that each cat should choose for themselves a leader to follow and set out to find new lands to settle.
column1903: Maybe some would have the strength to build a better life?
column1904: You, #player_name#, a cat of great renown, offered to lead a group into the unknown and build both a new home and a new Temple.
column1905: Soon, cats from every colony took up your call. Once enemies, now united by a common cause, you all set out to find a patch of earth to call your own.
column1906: But the wilderness is fraught with danger, and there are threats on all sides.
column1907: What will become of your colony? Will you lead them into a prosperous new era? Will you find the perfect place to build a home?
column1913: A dark cave yawns before you. Just inside, a steep staircase descends into the depths below. Would you like to enter the [orange]mine[/orange]?
column1914: A dark cave yawns before you. Just inside, a steep staircase descends into the depths below. Would you like to enter the [orange]second mine[/orange]?
column1915: A dark cave yawns before you. Just inside, a steep staircase descends into the depths below. Would you like to enter the [orange]third mine[/orange]?
column1916: This cave entrance is blocked. You cannot enter.
column1925: Nicely done, #player_name#! How many trips have you made to the very bottom? According to my records, [orange]#mine_bottom_level_visits#[/orange].
column1926: That's a whole lot of digging! We Moles will not forget your hard work!
column1927: A staircase that leads to the surface. Ascend the stairs and leave the mine behind?
column1932: This staircase leads further down. The rocky steps are damp with moisture.
column1933: This staircase leads further down. The smell of salt wafts up from below.
column1934: This staircase leads further down. You hear chittering noises.
column1935: This staircase leads further down. Your vision seems to swim as you stare into the depths below.
column1936: This staircase leads further down. The crumbling steps are dusty and cracked.
column1937: This staircase leads further down. The steps are overgrown with moss.
column1938: This staircase leads further down. You can't make out the bottom because of the oppressive darkness below!
column1939: This staircase leads further down. The faint scents of glue and charcoal can be detected.
column1940: This staircase leads further down. Watch your step, these stairs are icy and slick!
column1941: This staircase leads further down. A noxious, unwholesome odor flows up from the bottom.
column1942: This staircase leads further down. You can feel a blast of hot air coming up from below.
column1943: An enormous lock is preventing you from using the stairs. There must be a key hiding around here somewhere...
column1944: A strange energy barrier is preventing you from using the stairs. The runes read, [red]'Prove your strength. Defeat all foes to unlock this passage.'[/red]
column1945: An odd energy barrier is preventing you from using the stairs. The runes read, [blue]'Prove your wits. Solve the riddle of the statues to unlock this passage.'[/blue]
column1946: A cryptic energy barrier is preventing you from using the stairs. The runes read, [purple]'Prove your bravery. Extinguish all of the candles to unlock this passage.'[/purple]
column1947: These stairs are broken and dangerous. They cannot be used in their current state. If only you had a [green]Masonry Kit[/green]!
column1948: These stairs are broken and dangerous. They cannot be used in their current state. Would you like to use a [green]Masonry Kit[/green] to repair the staircase?
column1953: You found the hidden key and the locked staircase can now be used!
column1954: You've found an [purple]ancient key[/purple]!///You may now brave the challenges of the [blue][bouncy]second mine[/bouncy][/blue]. Find the entrance on the surface!
column1955: You've found an [purple]ancient key[/purple]!///You may now brave the challenges of the [blue][bouncy]third mine[/bouncy][/blue]. Find the entrance on the surface!
column1956: Hey, look at that. The [blue]second mine[/blue] has been reopened. Neat.///Now we can get back to work. Oh joy.
column1957: Woah, what happened? I was just nodding off and then all of a sudden I heard a weird noise and now the [blue]mine entrance[/blue] is all open and stuff. Creepy, right?///I'm not going in there 'cause I've got stuff to do, but if anybody wants to check it out, then go check it out, man.
column1959: A metal statue in the likeness of a cat stands before you. The engraving on the plaque reads:
column1960: This den used to belong to #player_spouse_name#, but now it is empty since they moved in with you!
column1966: Hello, #player_name#! I can't believe I'm actually talking to the one and only #player_name# right now. How cool is that?
column1967: It's #player_name#, right? I'm terrible with names. Forgive me.
column1968: Growing up I never was any good at hunting. Cats used to make fun of me for never catching a mouse. I've come a long ways since then. I'll prove them all wrong, you'll see!
column1969: I sense danger nearby. Stay alert or it might catch you unaware.
column1970: Something smells sweet. Do you suppose there's any [green]Catnip[/green] growing nearby?
column1971: Oh, uh... I wasn't taking a break! Honest! Sometimes my eyelids are just droopy! I'll get back to my post.
column1972: Hey, you looking for a fight? Me too. Maybe if we stick together we'll run into one.
column1973: I'm so bored. Maybe I'll go explore somewhere new later today.
column1974: Today looks like another perfect day!
column1975: Have you seen any bugs flying around? I've got quite the collection back home. I've got a little cage I made out of sticks and moss that I like to keep them in. They make me so happy!
column1976: Do I look like I have time to talk? I'm busy. Duh.
column1977: I don't really have anything to talk about. Sorry about that #player_name#.
column1978: You're #leader_title_with_article# that everyone's been talking about? Huh. Shorter than I had imagined.
column1979: I'm going to make my #colony_title# proud, just you wait and see! Every cat will know my name.
column1980: Woah, I can't believe I actually ran into the one and only #player_name#! Could today get any better? You're my hero!
column1981: Every #season# I try to come here to reflect. I don't know why but I've made it a tradition. I find it oddly calming.
column1982: #colony_full_name_capitalized_with_article# is lucky to have you as our #leader_title#.
column1983: When I came to #colony_full_name_with_article# I didn't know if I'd fit in. I'm still working on it to be completely honest.
column1984: You seen any of those creepy void cats around? Don't look into their eyes. They give me the shivers.
column1985: My whole family moved out here with me to #colony_full_name_with_article#. So far it's been a great place to live, if you can get over the constant attacks from those freaky void cats.
column1986: I've got kittens back home. I would give anything to protect my family from those that would threaten #colony_title_with_article#.
column1987: I'm tired. I stayed up very late last night scouting the area around town during my night watch. It's not the most fun job in the world but someone's got to do it.
column1988: If you can't find any prey in the area, it's because I've been having quite a productive day hunting! I must have already caught just about every critter around.
column1989: What, I'm supposed to listen to you? Not likely. I came here to the wilderness for freedom and independence. Hmph.
column1990: I'll treat you as my superior when you've proven that you've earned it. Why should I not choose for myself what needs doing?
column1991: Yesterday I was stalking in the tall grass and I found a weird shiny amulet that looked like a cat's paw. I didn't know what to do with it so I left it there.
column1992: Just a couple more hours 'til my shift is over. Then I can head home and take a well-deserved nap. I can't wait!
column1993: If I'm being honest I don't enjoy fighting. But it's my duty to defend the ones I love, so I'm happy to do what must be done.
column1994: Can't we just get along with the voidling cats? Has anyone ever tried offering them some [green]Catnip[/green] and a juicy [green]Trout[/green]? Maybe they'd appreciate it.
column1995: Achoo! Sorry, I've been sneezing all day long. Must be the pollen or something.
column1996: Hey, watch where you're going! You almost ran into me.
column1997: Phew, I need to take a dip in the river. My fur is getting all stinky and gross.
column1998: The Wildwood is nothing like where I'm from. I've never seen this many trees in my whole life. I'm still getting used to it.
column1999: I try my best to visit the Temple of the Forest Guardian once a week. It makes me feel safer knowing that the Guardian is blessing our #colony_title#.
column2000: There's a rumor around town about a super strong voidling cat that's ten feet tall. I hope I never run into that one!!
column2001: Hey #player_name#, I hear you're quite an athlete. Too bad you'll never be faster than me! I can outrun any cat!
column2002: I think the universe sends us messages through the weather. Some cats have the ability to read the signs, and others do not.
column2003: Strange have been my dreams as of late. There is a quivering in the fabric of reality. You have felt it too, have you not?
column2004: Dark omens cloud my thoughts today. I go where danger lurks. Perhaps I can overcome it?
column2005: I got quite a nasty bruise from a fight I got into yesterday. Now it hurts when I walk. Whatever, it'll heal soon. I'll be fine.
column2006: My littermates always liked climbing trees, but I'm too clumsy for that. I always fall to the ground when I try!
column2007: I'm filling in today for my friend. They came down with some sort of cough and couldn't make it to their shift.
column2008: Think I'll take some time off after today's scouting mission. I could use a couple down days to get back in the groove.
column2009: My buddy offered me three mice if I took their place on today's expedition. Now I'm out here doing the dirty work and my buddy is back in town taking a nap.
column2010: Oh my, did you see that beautiful bird that flew by a couple minutes ago? I don't like hunting birds. I just like watching them. Aren't they something?
column2011: I've got a real hankering for some fish, but I don't like getting my fur wet. How am I going to get one? Isn't that the cruelest irony?
column2012: I reckon you've seen a good battle or two today, #player_name#. I can see it in your eyes.
column2013: Must be difficult being #leader_title_with_article#. Well, I certainly don't envy you. Life's much simpler for me and I like it that way.
column2014: Thought you'd have more important things to do. I don't need you breathing down my neck, I can handle myself.
column2015: When I was a younger cat I made a lot of mistakes. I'm trying to redeem myself by committing my paws to public service. Can I ever repay the debts of my past?
column2016: I get agitated if I have nothing to do. I try my best to stay busy so I don't get into trouble.
column2017: I'm supposed to be looking for resources out here, but I don't really know where to find them. Do you think I'll have to go back empty handed?
column2018: Supposed to defend this area. I guess it's got strategic significance to #colony_title_with_article#. I don't see what makes it so special though.
column2019: Oh wow, the actual #player_name# is here to check on us? It's an honor! I'll be sure to bring back lots of stuff for the [purple]stockpile[/purple], you can count on me!
column2020: I like being assigned to the defense squads. You get a lot of time to think while staring out at the horizon. I won't get distracted though, I promise!
column2021: Did you hear me yawn? Sorry, I'll shape up. It's just so boring out here. Haven't seen a voidling all day.
column2022: Nothing to fight for miles. They wouldn't dare come near our squad.
column2023: My muscles are getting a real workout today! I'm supposed to carry all these resources back to town, but they're so heavy!
column2024: I relish the thought that my actions will serve to make life better for the rest of #colony_title_with_article#. That's what it's all about.
column2025: I have been assured that this assignment is of singular importance to #colony_full_name_with_article#. Perhaps you can fill me in on the details, #player_name#?
column2026: We're practically invincible with #leader_title_with_article# in our ranks! No way we'd lose a fight if those voidlings decided to show up now.
column2031: That skill is already at the max rank and cannot be upgraded further. Congrats!
column2033: You do not have enough XP to unlock that skill!
column2035: You do not have enough XP to upgrade that skill!
column2036: You cannot equip that skill because you have not unlocked it yet.

column2054: Quickly return to your den from anywhere in the world.
column2056: Call forth an unstoppable gust of energy that will travel in a straight line, hitting everything in its path.
column2058: Intimidate your enemies by baring your teeth. Saps a small amount of health from a nearby foe, replenishing your own.
column2060: Muster several loyal allies to your side.
column2062: Instantly cure all negative status effects from yourself and all nearby allies.
column2064: Launch yourself into battle with a powerful slash capable of dealing extraordinary damage.
column2066: Focus your mind, becoming invulnerable to damage and knockback for a short time.
column2068: Channel the power of death itself, instantly killing a randomly selected nearby foe.
column2070: Resets the cooldown of all other skills to 0 so they can immediately be used once more.
column2072: Applies a wound to all nearby enemies, damaging slowly over time.
column2074: Hurl several pointy pinecones that will damage the first thing they hit.
column2076: Call upon the Nine Lives, kind-hearted sprites that may aid you in your adventures.
column2078: Carve a powerful etching into the ground that will detonate when stepped across by an adversary.
column2080: Your advanced knowledge of plant life allows you to quickly detect everything that is growing nearby and where to find it.
column2082: Use in any map region to instantly gain a small amount of colony influence there.
column2086: Your presence is comforting to those around you. Use to gain a small amount of friendship points with all nearby cats.
column2088: If your next pounce is a success, you'll catch two prey instead of one. But if it fails, your target will instantly vanish.
column2090: Hum a soothing lullaby, healing all nearby allies over time.
column2092: Unleash a primal roar that will cause nearby voidling cats and some other enemies to flee for a short time.
column2093: You cannot use that skill right now.
column2094: You cannot modify your skills right now! Use the Scratching Post in your den to equip, unequip, or upgrade your skills.
column2101: A squad is collecting resources and defending here.
column2102: A main story objective is located here.
column2103: Here stands the [blue]Founders Stone[/blue], a mighty monument whose markings tell the tale of #colony_full_name_with_article#. What would you like to do?
column2106: Are you finished making changes to #colony_full_name_with_article#?

column2115: The [red]North town exit[/red] is currently unreachable from the Founders Stone due to obstacles. Please clear a path before continuing.
column2116: The [red]South town exit[/red] is currently unreachable from the Founders Stone due to obstacles. Please clear a path before continuing.

column2120: You cannot do that right now. Come back later.
column2121: This is the [purple]New Game+ Portal[/purple]. Glancing inside, you can see a multitude of fractured realities dancing in a cosmic swirl.
column2122: You cannot use the [purple]New Game+ Portal[/purple] as you have not yet met the requirements. You must have [red]at least one kitten[/red] that has reached the [red]max buddy level[/red].
column2123: You can use this portal to [purple]start a new savefile[/purple] as one of your kittens and experience an alternate reality.///Your current savefile will remain as-is, your progress will be saved, and you will be immediately returned to the Main Menu.///Your new file will begin with several bonuses based on you and your kitten's lives. In order to be eligible for a [purple]New Game+ savefile[/purple], your kitten must have reached the [red]max buddy level[/red].///Would you like to create a [purple]New Game+ savefile[/purple] now?

column2132: Select which kitten to use for your New Game+ savefile.
column2157: This looks like a great spot to curl up and sleep for a while. What would you like to do?
column2158: [gray](You will not receive any bonuses for sleeping because you have already slept recently.)[/gray]
column2162: Who would you like to assign to this bed? (Currently assigned: [red]#assignment_name#[/red])
column2163: This bed has been assigned to [red]#assignment_name#[/red]!
column2165: As you gaze, you see an image of the skies appear...///Today, #todays_forecast#. Right now, #weather_current#.
column2179: expect clear skies all day long
column2180: there will be rain showers all day
column2181: there will be snowfall all day
column2182: look for dense fog in the morning, breaking around noon, then clear skies throughout the afternoon and evening
column2183: we should have a sunny morning. Dark clouds will roll in around noon, bringing with them a strong storm front. Rain will continue into the night
column2184: we should have a clear morning. Dark clouds will roll in around noon, bringing with them a strong blizzard. Snow accumulation will continue into the night
column2185: expect a sunny morning, with rain showers beginning in the afternoon and continuing through the night
column2186: expect a clear morning, with snow beginning in the afternoon and continuing through the night
column2187: look for thick fog all day long
column2188: we'll have fog and showers in the morning. The fog will break around noon, but the rain will stick around. We'll see the fog return in the evening
column2189: we'll have fog and snow flurries in the morning. The fog will break around noon, but the snow will stick around. We'll see the fog return in the evening
column2190: we'll have rain in the morning and into the afternoon, when the clouds will break. We'll have clear skies throughout the evening
column2191: we'll have snow in the morning and into the afternoon, when the clouds will break. We'll have clear skies throughout the evening
column2192: there will be heavy rain all day, which will continue well into the night
column2193: there will be heavy snowfall all day, which will continue well into the night
column2194: expect a sunny day, with a light rain shower in the evening hours
column2195: expect a clear day, with light snow flurries in the evening hours
column2196: expect clear skies all day, with a thick fog rolling in at night
column2197: watch out for a thunderstorm that will last until noon, when the rain will lighten up. The clouds part around 3pm and we'll have clear skies all evening
column2198: watch out for a snowstorm that will last until noon, when the snow will lighten up. The clouds part around 3pm and we'll have clear skies all evening
column2199: a strong storm front will stick around all day. Be careful out there
column2200: a snowstorm will stick around all day. Be careful out there
column2209: There's nothing special going on today. Make it a good one.
column2210: That's all the news I have for now. I'm signing off. Thanks for watching!
column2211: Today is the first day of Spring! Happy New Year to all. There's plenty of prey running around now that the snow is gone.
column2212: Today is the first day of Summer! It's getting pretty hot out, isn't it?
column2213: Today is the first day of Autumn! The leaves are starting to fall from the trees. I think it's beautiful, don't you?
column2214: Today is the first day of Winter! Brrr, a cold front must have moved in over night. Everything's covered in snow! Stay warm as you go about your day.
column2215: Can you believe Spring is already half way over? I hope you've made the most of it!
column2216: Can you believe Summer is already half way over? It won't be this warm for long, so remember to take advantage of the weather.
column2217: Can you believe Autumn is already half way over? Better stock up on wild [green]Mushrooms[/green] before they're out of season.
column2218: Can you believe Winter is already half way over? Not too many snowy days left before it all melts. I'm looking forward to that!
column2219: It's the last day of Spring! Wow, that really flew by. It's your last chance to catch [green]Ladybugs[/green] and [green]Moths[/green] before they hibernate for the year!
column2220: It's the last day of Summer! Didn't it go quick? It's your last chance to catch [green]Butterflies[/green] before they migrate.
column2221: It's the last day of Autumn! Can you believe it? It's your last chance to catch [green]Dragonflies[/green] and [green]Fireflies[/green] before they go into hiding.
column2222: It's the last day of Winter! Finally, the sun is returning soon. It's your last chance to catch [green]Beetles[/green] before they hunker down for the year.
column2223: There's a special event happening today! The [red]#festival_name#[/red] is taking place at [red]#map_region#[/red]. It starts at [red]#festival_time#[/red]. Let's celebrate together!
column2224: Preparations are underway for the [red]#festival_name#[/red], which takes place tomorrow. Tune in tomorrow morning for all the details.
column2225: If you see [red]#birthday_npc_name#[/red] around town, please wish them a [rainbow]happy birthday[/rainbow]! You might also want to give them a thoughtful gift to let them know you appreciate them.
column2226: It's my [rainbow]birthday[/rainbow] today! I woke up this morning feeling great, so I know it's going to be another great year.
column2227: If you see #player_name# around town, please wish them a [rainbow]happy birthday[/rainbow]! You might also want to give them a thoughtful gift to let them know you appreciate them.
column2228: While you stare into the depths, you can hear kindly voices calling out to you with words of wisdom...
column2230: [blue]Hello, [/blue]#player_name#[blue]. How are you? I'd like to tell you more about hunting today.///Cats everywhere should be grateful for the abundance of prey in the wilderness.///Mice, squirrels, fish, birds, and more all bring nourishment to our bodies and should be respected for the critical role they play in our lives.///To catch a meal, you first must begin sneaking. When sneaking, you will crouch and stay low to the ground.///Your movements will be slowed so that you do not make any noises that could scare off a cautious critter.///Use your nose to sniff out the nearest animal, and approach with care when you see them. Prepare to pounce by continuing to move closer, but be warned!///If you get too close, your presence will become known, and your quarry will scurry away.///Use your wits as you go, and happy hunting to you![/blue]///[purple]You are strong and capable. Trust your mind to know its limits.[/purple]
column2231: [blue]Hello, [/blue]#player_name#[blue]. How are you? I'd like to tell you more about herbs today.///There are so many varieties of plants to be found in the wilderness. All types have useful properties, and a wise cat will study each to learn what benefits it can provide.///For example, Goldenseal and Marigold can tend to your wounds and treat poisonous injuries. Valerian can energize any cat and increase your movement speed.///Peppermint can mask your scent and make it easier to sneak around.///With each season, different herbs will become available or become dormant until next year.///Stay sharp as you travel through the world so that you will not overlook a growing herb that you could pick and use to your benefit. Happy foraging to you![/blue]///[purple]Look inward to find hidden strength. Self-affirmation is your weapon. Wield it and you will become unstoppable.[/purple]
column2232: [blue]Hello, [/blue]#player_name#[blue]. How are you? I'd like to tell you more about hunting today.///If you take the time to study your prey, you may find that your intuition will reveal to you just how close you can get before alerting the creature.///A circle radius will appear around the creature that will show you the exact distance that must be maintained in order to not frighten it.///Using our minds is important when hunting, because our intelligence can unravel many mysteries and problems, but we are so often in a rush and do not think to give enough time for our brains to sort things out.///Use this helpful tip the next time you are out hunting![/blue]///[purple]Confidence in one's own abilities is the prerequisite to success.[/purple]
column2233: [blue]Hello, [/blue]#player_name#[blue]. How are you? I'd like to tell you more about gift-giving today.///Gift-giving is an ancient tradition that stretches back centuries. Cats of all cultures have always given one another presents to show how they feel.///A well-picked gift is a great way to make a fast friend. Surely, no cat will turn down something that they love to collect.///However, gift-giving has its limits. It is impolite to offer or to accept more than one gift per day. A cat will turn down any present, even a great one, in order to save face when presented with too many.///Of course, you might offend someone if you offer the wrong gift. If a cat cannot stand to be around Mushrooms, do your best to avoid giving them a Mushroom if you do not wish to turn them into an enemy.///A little thoughtfulness goes a long way when selecting the perfect present.[/blue]///[purple]Be affectionate to yourself, and do not allow your thoughts to turn sour.[/purple]
column2234: [blue]Hello, [/blue]#player_name#[blue]. How are you? I'd like to tell you more about foraging today.///We already know that the season will impact which herbs are available for foraging. However, with a little planning ahead, we can have what we need all year long.///It is prudent to stock up on some of the more valuable herbs if you know they will stop growing soon. You can keep them in your den or in your storage, and they will not wither with time.///Isn't that wonderful? Now you can enjoy Goldenseal during the winter, or Snake Lily during the summer. You can eat Blackberries in the middle of spring. If you just spend some time planning ahead, anything is possible.[/blue]///[purple]Tend to the garden of your mind and water it with attention and love.[/purple]
column2235: [blue]Hello, [/blue]#player_name#[blue]. How are you? I'd like to tell you more about exploration today.///The world is full of exciting locales to tour, and there are all sorts of environments within walking distance of your front door.///Mountainous pine forests, sandy beaches, deep lakes, flower-filled meadows, murky swamps, and more are all waiting to be surveyed.///Each region of the world has its own distinct flora and fauna. You will find different prey running in the swamp than you would in the highlands, for example.///And different herbs will thrive in different biomes as well.///If you are looking for a particular item, it pays to know what region that item is native to before you begin your search.///Pay attention to your surroundings as you travel through the world so that you can learn the secrets of each area![/blue]///[purple]Visualizing the best version of yourself will allow you to reach higher and go farther than you ever could imagine.[/purple]
column2236: [blue]Hello, [/blue]#player_name#[blue]. How are you? I'd like to tell you more about bees today.///When journeying across a flower-filled meadow, it would be wise to stay alert to the possible presence of bees. These flying insects are good for their ecosystem, but bad news for a cat.///They have venomous stingers that can poison you if you get too close. Bees are incredibly territorial, and they will protect their hives with their lives.///If you see a beehive, steer clear unless you are looking for a fight.///However, if you do get in a scrap with a colony of bees, you may come home with a delicious prize.///By destroying a beehive, you can collect Honeycomb, a potent item capable of rendering you immune to all negative status effects, including poison, for a short time.///Adventurous cats will often take a bit of Honeycomb with them when they enter a dangerous place for protection.
